text.section: Any person who violates any provision of this chapter shall be guilty of a Class A misdemeanor;
Any person who violates any rule or regulation lawfully adopted by the board under the authority contained in this chapter shall be guilty of a Class B misdemeanor.

law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 103, sec. 5, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 354, sec. 25. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 233, sec. 23, effective June 30, 1960.
